snippet: Nets players worked out at the Barclays Center, their new Brooklyn arena, for the first time and noted that the fans will have the chance to be close to the court.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets work out at the Barclays Center for the first time; coach Avery Johnson praises the arena's intimate feel.
lead_paragraph: Nets players worked out at the Barclays Center, their new Brooklyn arena, for the first time and noted that the fans will have the chance to be close to the court.

headline.seo: At Practice, Nets Praise Intimate Feel of Barclays Center
headline.main: At First Practice, Nets Praise Intimate Feel of Arena
headline.print_headline: At Practice, Nets Praise Intimate Feel of Arena
